name: toggl-create-client
description: Create a new client in Toggl. [See the documentation](https://engineering.toggl.com/docs/api/clients#post-create-client)

name: toggl-create-project
description: Create a new project in Toggl. [See the documentation](https://engineering.toggl.com/docs/api/projects#post-workspaceprojects)

active.description: Whether the project is active or archived. Defaults to `true`.

isPrivate.description: Whether the project is private or not. Defaults to `false`.

isShared.description: Whether the project is shared or not. Defaults to `false`.

name: toggl-get-current-time-entry
description: Get the time entry that is running now. [See docs here]https://developers.track.toggl.com/docs/api/time_entries#get-get-current-time-entry)

name: toggl-get-time-entries
description: Get the last thousand time entries. [See docs here](https://developers.track.toggl.com/docs/api/time_entries#get-timeentries)

startDate.description: Get entries with start time, from start_date YYYY-MM-DD or with time in RFC3339 format. To be used with end_date.

endDate.description: Get entries with start time, until end_date YYYY-MM-DD or with time in RFC3339 format. To be used with start_date.

since.description: Get entries modified since this date using UNIX timestamp, including deleted ones.

before.description: Get entries with start time, before given date (YYYY-MM-DD) or with time in RFC3339 format.

meta.description: Should the response contain data for meta entities.

includeSharing.description: Include sharing details in the response.

name: toggl-get-time-entry
description: Get details about a specific time entry. [See docs here](https://developers.track.toggl.com/docs/api/time_entries)

name: toggl-update-client
description: Updates an existing client in Toggl. [See the documentation](https://engineering.toggl.com/docs/api/clients#put-change-client)

name: toggl-update-project
description: Updates an existing project in Toggl. [See the documentation](https://engineering.toggl.com/docs/api/projects#put-workspaceproject)

active.description: Whether the project is active or archived.

isPrivate.description: Whether the project is private or not.

isShared.description: Whether the project is shared or not.
